name: error
shortDescription: Called when an error occurs in Homegear.
description: This method is called when an error occurs within Homegear. It is raised for messages of log level 1 (critical), 2 (error) and 3 (warning).
signatures: Void error(String interfaceId, Integer level, String message)

parameters.name: interfaceId
parameters.description: The interface ID as specified in init().

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The log level of the error message. Possible values are 1 (critical), 2 (error) or 3 (warning).

parameters.name: message
parameters.exampleValue: Module HomeMatic BidCoS: HM-LGW "Living Room": Warning: Connection closed. Trying to reconnect...
